name: Ghost Tiger Incident
description:
July 4th 1963

To: Fist Agents 

From: Department of Foreign Occult Policy DFOP

Memorandum: Ghost Tiger Incident.

Agents, 

We have been informed of an occult threat in the Kursk Oblast. Unofficial reports of a “Ghost Tiger” started up several weeks ago. Officially The USSR has blamed farmers plowing buried munitions. Last night the KGB Occult Division formally asked for assistance. We are deploying you to hunt down this anomaly and remove it from the field. Destroy or capture.

Good Luck

-DFOP Chairman O.K Boomhauer

Author's Note: This is a One page Mission for Fist. Use it as you see fit.  Feel free to leave a comment.
